sourcesContent:
// src/ui/theme.ts
export const COLOURS = {
  text:         '#111827',
  border:       '#d0d7de',
  neutral:      '#ffffff',
  success:      '#059669',
  danger:       '#dc2626',
  danger_border:'#fca5a5',
  warning:      '#d97706',
  panel:        '#f9fafb',
  divider:      '#e5e7eb',
  favourite:    '#ffd700',
  unfavourite:  '#808080'
};
